Pre-Game Insights: Ghana is grouped with Sudan, Angola, and Niger in Group F, and a win against Sudan would be a significant boost to their qualification chances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana's Black Stars coach, Otto Addo, has unveiled 25-man squad for the upcoming Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) qualifier against Sudan.
Others: The squad boasts an impressive lineup, featuring captain Thomas Partey, Jordan Ayew, Mohammed Kudus, Antoine Semenyo, and Inaki Williams, who have been making waves in Europe.
